comment: A point belongs to the closure of a subset iff there is a sequence in the subset converging to it. Theorem 1.4-6(a) of [Kreyszig] p. 30. This proof uses countable choice ~ ax-cc . The statement can be generalized to first-countable spaces, not just metrizable spaces. (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.)
